title: Complete Genome Sequences of Four Major Viruses Infecting Marine Shrimp in Egypt
body: The whole-genome sequences of the four viruses from Egypt have been deposited in GenBank under accession numbers KT316249, KT316250, KT316251, KT316252, KT316253, KT316254, KT316256, KT316257, KT316258, KT316259, and KT316260 for PstDNV1; KR492908, KR492909, KR492910, KR492911, KT316240, KT316241, KT316242, KT316243, KT316244, and KT316245 for HPV; KT316279 for GAV; and KT316278 for YHV.
